body:
this is night she's my wife and I'm gonna write self insert fiction where she loves me through it all (and put it on my website)

note that I actually still think photography is helping with my Feeling Useless all the time, but that's not gonna stop me from spawning Night into existence
knock on wood, but I think I'm gonna try picking up photography. if anything, it's a motivator to go outside more, and maybe fiddling with camera settings is more fufilling than Krita ones, lol
everything sucks. I wanna write. I wanna draw. I wanna get stuck to something. but I get bored of everything I do. I want to fill my heart with AI generated anime girls
I'm updating my site to have an old-internet messageboard feel. it even uses tables! how archaic lol

Kitsune spirit woman invades your home to steal your food, and finds herself so successful in that endeavor that she decides to stay forever. Under spiritual law, this means she now owns you, your house, and is now your wife (you don't have a choice).

sometimes I get anxiety surrounding editing my Minecraft fork because I fear I might make a mistake or 'ruin' it, but I need to overcome those anxieties if I want to make something I truly feel proud of

header: I did it!! I'm THAT ARTIST BRO
body:
who knew when you enjoy art you enjoy art. zamn. I gonna do this more defo fr yes

here's the deviantart post btw

oh, to draw passionate of that being pictured and free from the concept of 'correctness,' hasty to experience (not endure) yet another design; to have art be a respite rather than a requirement with fufillments to be met (and inevitablely left unsatisfied); to be unbridled by expectation and eager to fail; I want to be that artist

cuz how will I draw like this otherwise
this is the cutest wiki I've ever seen. I need to make a tiny minecraft fork, gawsh

header: I need to draw more butts
body: (I did not draw this this is just an example)
It's called r/MedievalBBW, and I made it since 1) I wanted to have a place for solely middle-ages fat women (pretty niche but very cute) and 2) I just wanted to make a subreddit lol

header: What if I just learned how to cook
body:
Like, I'm hungry ALL the time, and I want to get delivery/fast food but it's just soo expensive. Pizza dough isn't that hard to make, though?? Like, what if I just made pizza whenever I was hungry. I'm gonna have my license soon. I can just buy ingredients.

(today is pizza day which is why I'm thinking of pizza)
where the bitches are thick and they ask for a different tip... ü•¥

I ate. an Entire bag of spicy queso popcorners and they were GOOD AS FUCK but now my stomach hurts and I feel like a feedee.

I'm gonna try to exercise my wrists since that might help me with rock climbing... and gaming
headcanon: fat women will like you even if you don't have a good personality if you can do so much as lift them
literally if you're gonna üçÜ you HAVE to follow this guide, masturbation is literally physical meditation and spiritual connection with The Girl on Your Screen

header: I have fallen in love with Korone Inugami
body:
Because I always fail to make an OC I like, I've decided I'd rather draw preexisting characters. Specifically, I want to hyperfixate on Korone, because I love her (design yup)!!

DON'T TOUCH HER she's literally MY waifu >:(

headcanon she thinks she's still a size women's small

I'm designing this site off tumblr blogs since... I want a place to blog but prefer websites tbh. This is like my personal journal that you just so happen to be reading.

Uh, the post dates represent the time I first made that post, but I like optimizing things so I may rewrite posts after I've made them idfk
